meanings.definition: Not related to or characteristic of the theater.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a collection of nontheatrical paintings.
meanings.sent2: The nontheatrical film was created for online streaming.
meanings.sent3: The nontheatrical play about talking animals was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her nontheatrical approach to storytelling was refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The nontheatrical setting of the abandoned warehouse added to the eerie atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Not intended for or suitable for performance in a theater.
meanings.sent1: The small puppet show was a nontheatrical production.
meanings.sent2: The nontheatrical script was better suited for a small screen.
meanings.sent3: The nontheatrical dance routine in the office party surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: His nontheatrical style of comedy was a hit with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The nontheatrical nature of the event made it feel intimate and special.

meanings.definition: Not involving or related to theatrical activities.
meanings.sent1: The company organized a nontheatrical team-building workshop.
meanings.sent2: The nontheatrical event focused on outdoor activities.
meanings.sent3: The nontheatrical meeting turned into a fun karaoke session.
meanings.sent4: Her nontheatrical hobbies included gardening and painting.
meanings.sent5: The nontheatrical nature of the conference allowed for more casual interactions.
